INJURY NEWS
Sunday, 7/30/2025
Friday 3/3/2025 :
Edward Clinard was injured as he tried to steal a base.
Diagnosis: Inflamed Abdominal Muscle.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 1-2 weeks.
